availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p: I, of the & Chatham T. Ewingsolemnly swear that I will well & truly perform the duties of commissioner of Deeds for the State of Pennsylvania to the best of my ability -- County of Allegheny State of Kentucky

State of Pennsylvania
Allegheny County } ss

Before me Prothonotary of the in & for the State & county above named, came the above named Chatham T. Ewing who being duly sworn according to law made the foregoing affidavit and acknowledged his signature to be genuine. In witness whereof I have herein to signed my name & affixed my official SealJacob H Walter Court of Common Pleas

Comr Deeds
Oath of C. T. Ewing
Pennsylvania
filed 9th Deby 1865
